text: Dame Arlene Phillips (born 22 May 1943) is an English choreographer, talent scout, judge and television presenter, theater director and former dancer. She has worked in many fields of entertainment. ==Works== For many years, she rose to prominence as the choreographer for many West End and Broadway musicals, films, and television shows. She later rose to mainstream fame as a judge on television talent shows. These include Strictly Come Dancing and So You Think You Can Dance. She was a guest on the ITV celebrity wild programme I am a Celebrity...Get Me Out Of Here!. title: Arlene Phillips
